column2: SELECT TOP #   /*get the ID from galSpecExtra*/    gal.specObjID as ID,      /*get the mean masses from each table*/   gal.lgm_tot_p5# as galtotal_mass,   gal.lgm_fib_p5# as galfibre_mass,   EDust.logMass_median as EDust_mass,   ENoDust.logMass_median as ENoDust_mass,   WDust.logMass_median as WDust_mass,   WNoDust.logMass_median as WNoDust_mass,      /*get the SFR-s from each table*/   gal.sfr_tot_p5# as galtotal_sfr,   gal.sfr_fib_p5# as galfibre_sfr,   EDust.ssfr_mean as EDust_sfr,   ENoDust.ssfr_mean as ENoDust_sfr,   WDust.ssfr_mean as WDust_sfr,   WNoDust.ssfr_mean as WNoDust_sfr,      /*get the attenuations from each table*/     /*young stars*/   EDust.dust1_mean as EDust_dust1,   ENoDust.dust1_mean as ENoDust_dust1,   WDust.dust1_mean as WDust_dust1,   WNoDust.dust1_mean as WNoDust_dust1,     /*old stars*/   EDust.dust2_mean as EDust_dust2,   ENoDust.dust2_mean as ENoDust_dust2,   WDust.dust2_mean as WDust_dust2,   WNoDust.dust2_mean as WNoDust_dust2,      /*get the ages masses from each table*/   EDust.age_mean as EDust_age,   ENoDust.age_mean as ENoDust_age,   WDust.age_mean as WDust_age,   WNoDust.age_mean as WNoDust_age    FROM galSpecExtra gal   /*get the tables-rename them-join the tables and keep the ID from galSpecExtra*/   JOIN stellarMassFSPSGranEarlyDust EDust ON EDust.specObjID=gal.specObjID   JOIN stellarMassFSPSGranEarlyNoDust ENoDust ON ENoDust.specObjID=gal.specObjID   JOIN stellarMassFSPSGranWideDust WDust ON WDust.specObjID=gal.specObjID   JOIN stellarMassFSPSGranWideNoDust WNoDust ON WNoDust.specObjID=gal.specObjID    WHERE    /*remove rows with unknown value*/   gal.specObjID != # AND   gal.lgm_tot_p5# != # AND   gal.lgm_fib_p5# != # AND   EDust.logMass_median != # AND   ENoDust.logMass_median != # AND   WDust.logMass_median != # AND   WNoDust.logMass_median != #
